Module universityProject
Package usersPackage

Class Manager

java.lang.Object
usersPackage.User
usersPackage.Employee
usersPackage.Manager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<User>, CanViewAcademicInfo, Observer
Direct Known Subclasses:
AcademManager, NewsManager, ORManager
public abstract class Manager extends Employee implements CanViewAcademicInfo, Observer
The Manager class represents an abstract manager in the system. It extends the Employee class and implements the CanViewAcademicInfo and Observer interfaces.
